duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and Execute SAP QM based projects with integration with other modules.
Ability to handle multiple projects parallelly.
Organize and conduct Unit and Integration Testing.
Lead team of developers and other analysis.
Organize and conduct end user training for SAP.
Align and follow corporate rules and guidelines in software design, development, and testing.
Be part of production support helpdesk during the hyper care period ensure business runs smoothly.
Flexible in work timing to overlap with end-user time zones.
